title: Healing
description: After a devastating loss, Anna Johnston finally has her life on track. She and her young son, Roman, have created a safe and comfortable home life. Since losing Roman’s father, Anna has avoided dating and love...until she meets Noah Evans.  Noah Evans has just ended a relationship based on lies and isn’t looking for anything permanent. New to town, his focus is on finishing a new remodel and making money, but on a boys’ night out, he meets Anna and everything changes. Now, Noah wants something real; a place to call home and he is determined to get what he wants.  Stubbornness and fear collide with passion and romance in this sweet and sexy love story.  Due to explicit sex scene, 18+ please
author: Rachel Caid
